definition: to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: But the corners are slower here and there are only small lateral forces.
sentences.chinese: 但是这里的弯角更慢，侧面只有很小的力。

sentences.english: Hamilton said he lost time in T9 (where Webber crashed) and on the final hairpin he lost whatever advantage he had.
sentences.chinese: 汉密尔顿说在9号弯角和最后一个回头弯没有跑好。

sentences.english: I think it has great types of corners.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这里有很棒的弯角。

sentences.english: Q. Off the start line into the first corner and the incident with Vettel?
sentences.chinese: 在起步线之后的第一个弯角你与瓦特尔有一个小事故？

sentences.english: Will be the annual Christmas reindeer run wild and turn the corner as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 每年圣诞节的驯鹿将会疯狂的奔跑并尽快的拐过弯角。

sentences.english: Drivers experience severe G-forces as they corner, accelerate and brake.
sentences.chinese: 车手在弯角，加速或减速时会感受到很大的G力。

sentences.english: How do you find the new chicane here?
sentences.chinese: 对于这里的新增加的减速弯角你怎么看？

sentences.english: Every year on Christmas the reindeers are going crazy and turn the corner too fast.
sentences.chinese: 每年圣诞节的驯鹿将会疯狂的奔跑并尽快的拐过弯角。

sentences.english: Off the start line into the first corner and the incident with Vettel?
sentences.chinese: 就是在起步的时候，第一个弯角你和维特尔的碰撞？

sentences.english: Remove caliper flex hose brackets from the frame rails.
sentences.chinese: 从车架的轨道拆卸弯角器折曲软管支架。

definition: to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
variant of 榔頭|榔头[lang2 tou5]
